boardgame.name: The Great Battles of Alexander: Deluxe Edition
The Great Battles of Alexander: Expanded Deluxe Edition
boardgame.description: The Great Battles of Alexander: Deluxe Edition, the updated, expanded, full-color-enhanced version of the best-selling, multi-award-winning game system that started the Great Battles of History series, includes new game counters, maps, packaging, battles, and scenarios that cover all the major battles from the original game and the Juggernaut module, plus five additional battles ... ten in all. The Great Battles of Alexander: Deluxe Edition is virtually the complete history of Alexander the Great and the Macedonian art of war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game features:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Third Edition rules, with many changes and additions _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New maps for The Granicus and Chaeronea, plus an expanded Gaugamela map _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Armies for the Danubian tribes, Illyrians, Greeks, Persians, Scythians, and Indians _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Eighteen new Macedonian Commanders _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New Restricted Line Command system for Persians, Indians and Greeks _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wing Commanders and Macedonian Contingent Commanders _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cavalry Shock Formations: The Companion Wedge and the Thessalian Diamond _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Persian Immortals and Kinsmen, Macedonian artillery, cataphracted cavalry ... and cataphracted elephants!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 720 full-color two-sided counters (43 full-color two-sided double-size counters)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Three full-color double-sided 22x34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; map sheets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One 10-sided die _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 32-page Rule Book _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 24-page Scenario Book _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Player Aid Cards: Two 8.5x11_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards showing game charts _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; tables_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;TIME SCALE: 20 minutes per turn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP SCALE: 70 yards per hex _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;UNIT SCALE: 100 men per strength point _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NUMBER OF PLAYERS: One to four_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

A 100% complete copy of the deluxe game. It is unpunched and unplayed. The components are in mint condition. The box has creasing on the lid and the bottom from having far too many games stacked on top. It is solid however with no split corners. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to post pictures upon request. Buyer to pay postage not to exceed the USPS Priority Flat rate of $8.95. Insurance would be an additional $1.65. I am always happy to combine shipping for multiple purchases. International buyers need to contact me for rates. Most of western Europe is around $24.00 USD for 6-10 day service.

Opened but unpunched. Like new! Tyrant expansion is included in the box (also unpunched). Smoke-free home. I can hand in person in Barcelona. For payment I prefer bank transfer to PayPal.

punched but well cared for and trimmed like a surgeon. deluxe 4th edition with all like new components,box too. PLUS an unpunched 18 replacement counter set from GMT dated 2004 and a pair of 3CI sourced scenarios. Alexander inspired joke; you know what 69 is? what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 71? 69 with two fingers in the ass. well packed...
